import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import { get, search } from "./BooksAPI"; import "./components/Books/book.css"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState(""); const [searchResult, setSearchResult] = useState([]); const [selectBook, setSelectBook] = useState([]); const handleChange = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setSearchValue(event.target.value); let result = await search(event.target.value); setSearchResult(result); console.log(result, "result"); }; const changeShelf = async (id) => { let book = await get(id); console.log(book); }; return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    {searchResult.map((result, id) => { return (
  1. {result.title}
    {result.authors.map((author) => author)}
    2. ); })}
) : (
